Class DataFile

  • java.lang.Object
    • db.DataFile

  • public class DataFile
extends java.lang.Object
    Handles reading and writing of tables to and from files.
    Since:
    0.3

      Reads a table from file, file must be a serialized Table object.

      • saveTable

        public void saveTable(Table table,
                      java.lang.String name)
               throws java.io.IOException
        Saves a table to a file, serializing the object data.
        Parameters:
        table - the table object to be saved.
        name - name of the table, used to define filename.
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException
        Since:
        0.3

      • readTable

        public Table readTable(java.lang.String tableName)
                throws java.io.IOException,
                       java.lang.ClassNotFoundException
        Reads a table from file, file must be a serialized Table object.
        Parameters:
        tableName - the name of the file containing the Table object.
        Returns:
        the Table object that has been read in.
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException
        java.lang.ClassNotFoundException
        Since:
        0.3

      • listTables

        public java.lang.String[] listTables()
                              throws java.io.IOException
        Get the names of all the tables stored in files.
        Returns:
        the table names as Strings in an array.
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException
        Since:
        0.5
